title: Ranked Game - How can Games like this dont count for a 'Loss prevented'

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
Why Rito? Why can't this be a Loss prevented. 

Lost 17 LP and couldnt do anything about this...

replies.body: "Loss prevent" gibt es nur bei schwerwiegenden Server-Problemen.
